args: This is the place. Are you two ready?
Sure are. Let's show them what\nwe're made of!

Today's Observer: Mitsuba

The prince took me and Valerio on a
mission to a town near the Halidom.
Valerio! Mitsuba! I need your help.\nWe have a culinary crisis on our hands.
Whoa. What's got you looking so grim?
I think it would be better if I explained.
You see, we went out to check the welfare\nof a town situated south of the forest.

We'd heard the soil wasn't good for
growing crops, so we brought the
residents some fresh vegetables.
But...
Well, the adults were happy,\nbut the children...not so much.
If I had to guess, it's probably because\nthey're so used to poor-quality crops that\nthey think all vegetables taste bad.
Cleo tried putting together a vegetable-\nheavy meal for them, but they showed\nzero interest.
In all of my years of cooking for others,\nI've never experienced anything half as\nhumiliating.
It sounds like it's going to be tough\nturning these kids into veggie believers.
You said it, Pipple. They don't\nknow what they're missing.
Based on what you just told us,\nyou want us to go to that town and\nspread the veggie gospel, right?
Please! Don't let my humiliation\nbe in vain!
Hey, chill out. It's gonna be okay.
Ew, not more vegetables!\nWe don't want 'em!
Well, this looks like a worthwhile project.
Oh, what's that? Some kinda doll?
This is Pipple. He's a vegetable.
Nuh-uh! Vegetables can't talk or move!
That's because he's a SPECIAL veggie!\nSo be nice to him, kiddo!
R-really? Then... Ooh, I know!\nLet's go play, Pipple!
That should keep them busy.\nLet's roll up our sleeves and start\ncooking while they're occupied.
After tasting what we whip up,\nthey're gonna be full-blown veg-a-holics!
So, are you REALLY a vegetable?
Huh. Well, then you're the only good one,\nbecause I HATE vegetables!
Me too! They're always so bitter and dry.
But then we get yelled at if we don't eat\nthem, and that just makes us hate them\neven more!
Oh no! I'm sorry. Please don't cry.
If there really IS such a thing as a\ntasty vegetable, I'd love to try it, but...
Same. Maybe then I'd actually learn\nto like them.
What's this? Is it for me?
All the ingredients are simmering\nnicely. If I just leave it all to boil...
He just jumped into the pot!\nNot this again!
Pipple. NO. BAD PIPPLE!\nQuick, open the lid, or he's gonna
